name: VincentJulietLoyaltyConversation
_source: s;Simon;You two said there was something urgent.|What is it?
s;Vincent;We... look, we weren't trying to undermine you-
s;Juliet;We've sent letters home, but haven't heard back.|It's been a few weeks now, and we're nervous.
s;Simon;I thought Luther said not to do that?
s;Juliet;I talked him into it. If you're angry, be angry at me.
s;Simon;I'm not angry.{w} How far from here is your village?
s;Vincent;It's Ramm Village, just over the border.|Milord, give us a few days, and we'll return.
s;Simon;No need to go alone.{w} We'll all accompany you.
s;Vincent;It's too dangerous!{w} I can't ask you to take that risk.
s;Simon;You two have had plenty of opportunity to abandon Luther and I.|I want to repay that debt.
s;Juliet;Thanks, Simon.{w} We can guide you to Ramm whenever you're ready.
